author: jvanzyl
msg: o Removing the notion of a default goal when one isn't specified. It is not
possible to anticipate the context in which Maven will run and this must
be left up to the user to specify in their maven.xml file.
I have modified Maven to work when a project.xml file is not present.
This has been changed so that goals may be run that generate project
skeletons. In this case I am generating a plexus application skeleton
which will hopefully use Dion's example plugin to generate a skeletal
maven project.
The default goal was java:jar. This goal when a project.xml file isn't
present makes zero sense so I've removed the forced default and will
leave it up to users. At worst maven does nothing, no biggie.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o correct entity.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a helper bean that can be used as a tool from inside plugins to load resources from a custom ClassLoader or from the jar that the plugin is contained in.

author: jvanzyl
msg: rearranging xmlns entries

author: jvanzyl
msg: o The namespace entry for the maven tag lib can be written as:
xmlms:maven="jelly:maven"
instead of
xmlms:maven="jelly:org.apache.maven.tags.project.MavenTagLibary"
The maven tag has been place in the context and the same set up for
a while but forgot about it.
